p: To overcome the issue that soil moisture values from different climate models are often not directly comparable (Koster et al., 2009), they can be standardized based on the variability in a defined base period (Berg et al., 2017). Here this approach is applied to all explanatory variables ( R sd, R ld, θ, α), which are normalized by the standard deviation of all monthly values in the base period 1970–1999 on each grid box separately. The values of the dependent variable T are not transformed.
